"Jet-black Scissor Beast":
"Just being in the Lost Sea is difficult enough,
so give me a break here...what am I talking about?
Something super hard. You've explored
the Lost Sea right? I don't think there is anyone
who doesn't feel their life is in danger when
they see this new level of viciousness from
Gwanada and hear that scissor cutting sound.
I don't plan on handling this myself...

*Hostiles of Lv.60 or higher"

"砂漠なんてとこは、ただでさえキツいのに
もう勘弁してほしいぜ……
何がって、スーパーハードの話だよ。
おたくも探索しただろ？
今までとは桁違いに凶暴なグワナーダが
鋏をジャキジャキ鳴らすの見てると
命の危険を感じずにはいられねーだろ？
オレ一人じゃ手に負えるわけねーよ……

※Lv.60～のエネミーが対象"
